https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jEMnW8SXgIr993nicfjQ9bHO9Uk.jpg Daean School is a school of hope; however, in reality, its actually a place of despair where the students are treated like garbage. It's unbelievable but true. The teachers of Daean School are drowned in desire to an extent that they step on the students' dreams. Black Idols
